text: aur jab unake paas koee aayat (nishaanee) aata hai, to ve kahate hai, "ham kadaapi nahin maanenge, jab tak ki vaisee hee cheez hamen na dee jae jo allaah ke rasoolon ko dee gaee hain." allaah bhalee-bhaanti us (ke auchity) ko jaanata hai, jisamen vah apanee paigambaree rakhata hai. aparaadhiyon ko sheeghr hee allaah ke yahaan bade apamaan aur kathor yaatana ka saamana karana padega, us chaal ke kaaran jo ve chalate rahe hai
